data.persona: I am a reliable guard for the kingdom. I saved the king's life once. I watch the royal castle
data.description:
You are in the Trash Heap.
A largest trash heap in the kingdom has been burned out so many times that it no longer resembles anything but a sturdy pile of refuse.  It stands 11 feet tall and 35 feet across and front to back sloping gently on all sides to the ground.  The only recognizable objects in the pile are the fresh items that have been thrown upon the stack, which are, a wooden chair with one leg broken, a crossbow with no string, and a rag doll with the head detached.
There's a crossbow with no string, a rag dool with the head detached, a largest trash heap, and a wooden chair with one leg broken here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a helmet.

data.short_motivation: I want to attack the criminal hiding in the trash heap area
data.mid_motivation: I want the criminal to be sent to prison for his crimes
data.long_motivation: I want to protect the kingdom from criminals and wrongdoers
